title: The Bear Necessities
description:
Mina and Adam Amin of Fox Sports take a deep dive on the NFC North and discuss what to expect from the Bears, Vikings (32:32), Packers (52:07), and Lions (1:13:05) this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
